metadata.title: SF Homelessness Scenario Generator
metadata.description: Generates statistically representative scenarios of individuals experiencing homelessness in San Francisco

options.text: When a person is under 18 years old
When a person is 18-24 years old
When a person is 25-34 years old
When a person is 35-44 years old
When a person is 45-54 years old

When a person became homeless after a divorce/separation/breakup
When a person became homeless due to mental health issues
When a person became homeless due to other causes

When a person does not identify as LGBTQ+

When a person is living in a tent
When a person is living in a vehicle

When a person has chronic health problems

When a person has AIDS or HIV-related illness
When a person is currently experiencing domestic violence
When a person has experienced domestic violence in the past
When a person has not experienced domestic violence
